title: S74 Color Chase; T213-2 Bender; T222 Archer
author: nolemmings

posts.post_title: S74 Color Chase; T213-2 Bender; T222 Archer
posts.post_content:
A few for sale:
1. S74 Hal Chase yellow: $250.00 ppd.
2. T213-2 Chief Bender Phil Nat no trees: $225 ppd.
3. T222 Jimmy Archer PSA 3; $225 ppd.

Chase--slightly threadbare but top and bottom threads are excellent,no fraying except ever so slight upper left.
Technical grade probably VG-EX, although presents better and grading companies, to the extent they grade these at all, are notoriously tough:
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/various/huge/10s74chase.jpg[/IMG]
(colored silk so no backing)

Bender-- has three horizontal/diagonal creases through area from pitching elbow to glove wrist. Technical grade probably g-vg, possibly VG.  Creases are not heavy but are in an obtrusive spot.  Well centered and corners Vg or better--presents very well for this issue.
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/various/huge/14t213bender_nt.jpg[/IMG]

Archer-- has several crimps particular to this issue; three along left side about hat level and a couple full horizontal around knee/calf.  Well centered and the only PSA 3 with one graded higher (SGC pop report shows three in this grade).
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/imoverhere/prewar/various/huge/14t222archer.jpg[/IMG]
